subject: Re: Project Timeline Discussion
text: Hi Alice, Thanks for the detailed breakdown. I agree with the proposed timeline. A few additional points: - Let's schedule weekly check-ins every Friday - We should consider adding buffer time for testing - The client presentation is confirmed for March 15th Let me know if you need any additional resources. Best, Bob On Mon, Jan 22, 2024 at 2:30 PM Alice Developer <alice.developer@company.com> wrote: > Hi Bob, > > I've reviewed the project requirements and here's my proposed timeline: > > Phase 1: Research and Planning (Jan 23 - Feb 2) > - Requirements analysis > - Technical architecture design > - Resource allocation > > Phase 2: Development (Feb 5 - Feb 23) > - Core functionality implementation > - API development > - Frontend development > > Phase 3: Testing and Deployment (Feb 26 - Mar 8) > - Unit and integration testing > - User acceptance testing > - Production deployment > > The total timeline is approximately 7 weeks. Let me know your thoughts. > > Best regards, > Alice
html:
Hi Alice,

Thanks for the detailed breakdown. I agree with the proposed timeline.

A few additional points:

  • Let's schedule weekly check-ins every Friday
  • We should consider adding buffer time for testing
  • The client presentation is confirmed for March 15th

Let me know if you need any additional resources.

Best,
Bob

On Mon, Jan 22, 2024 at 2:30 PM Alice Developer <alice.developer@company.com> wrote:

Hi Bob,

I've reviewed the project requirements and here's my proposed timeline:

Phase 1: Research and Planning (Jan 23 - Feb 2)

  • Requirements analysis
  • Technical architecture design
  • Resource allocation

Phase 2: Development (Feb 5 - Feb 23)

  • Core functionality implementation
  • API development
  • Frontend development

Phase 3: Testing and Deployment (Feb 26 - Mar 8)

  • Unit and integration testing
  • User acceptance testing
  • Production deployment

The total timeline is approximately 7 weeks. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Alice
